rules_text:
{T}: Add {C}. Put a gem counter on Crystalline Clutches.
{4}, {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. Activate only if there are three or more gem counters on Crystalline Clutches.
flavor_text: [i]Stardust crystals are often worn by the wives of rail barons and sheriffs as an ostentatious display of power and wealth.[/i]
